title.full: Place The Arrows On The Floor
title.reduced: Place The Arrows On The Floor

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An incredibly fast paced fun family strategy game, Place The Arrows allows up to 8 players to play simultaneously in the same room, and multiple players on only one pad! Guide people to your castle and monsters to your opponents, but beware- your opponents will be doing the same. Use your cunning and bonus powers to rescue the most people, and win the game.
